question: Has anyone else on here been dx'd with Fibromyalgia, but also suffer with ankle clonus, and or spasms in the legs. I'm misserable and terrified that my neurologist is just blowing me off, Have had 2 MRI's to rule out MS, lots of blood work for B12, diabetes, thyroid, all clear. Is this even normal. And does anyone else have Fibromyalgia with clonus??? Please respond, thanks so much.
title: Please Help Someone Please!!
